P.S. I have ordered the 2 seats for 6 lec- tures , but you speak as if you meant to come 6 times! Bless your heart â€” it is the same lecture repeated word for word 6 times . I thought I ought in sim- ple kindness to tell you.
Mark Twain to Unknown, n.y. Wednesday
